article.title: Harlem U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Harlem U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​

Harlem Office Contact Information

Harlem U.S. Export Assistance Center
163 W. 125th St., Suite 901
New York, NY 10027
Phone: 212-860-6200
Fax: 212-860-6203
Email:office.harlem@trade.gov
Website:http://www.export.gov/newyork/harlem

Harlem Staff

KL Fredericks, USEAC Director
Phone: 212-860-6200
Fax: 212-860-6203
Email:KL.Fredericks@trade.gov

Industries:Accounting Services, Advertising Services, Agricultural Chemicals, Agricultural Machinery & Eq., Agricultural Services, Air Conditioning/Refrigeration Eq., Apparel, Architectural/Constr./Engineering SVC, Artwork, Audio/Visual Eq., Automobile/Light Truck/Vans, Automotive Parts/Services Eq., Aviation Services, Biotechnology, Books/Periodicals, Building Products, Business Eq. (Non-Computer), Composite Materials, Computer Services, Computer Software, Computers/Peripherals, Construction Eq., Consumer Electronics, Cosmetics/Toiletries, Defense Industry Eq., Dental Eq., Drugs/Pharmaceuticals, Economy, Education/Training Services, Electrical Power Systems, Electronic Commerce, Electronic Components, Electronics Industry Prod/Test Eq., Employment Services, Films/Videos, Financial Services, Food Processing/Packaging Eq., Foods - Processed, Footwear, Forestry/Woodworking Machinery, Franchising, Furniture, General Consumer Goods, General Industrial Eq./Supplies, General Science & Technology, General Services, Giftware, Health Care Services, Hotel/Restaurant Eq., Household Consumer Goods, Industrial Chemicals, Information Services, Insurance Services, Investment Services, Iron/Steel, Jewelry, Laboratory Scientific Instruments, Lawn/Garden Eq., Leasing Services, Leather/Fur Products, Machine Tools/Metalworking Eq., Management Consulting Services, Marine Fisheries Products (Seafood), Medical Eq., Musical Instruments, Non-Ferrous Metals, Oil/Gas/Mineral Prod/Explor Serv., Operations/Maintenance Services, Packaging Eq., Paper/Paperboard, Pet Foods/Supp., Photographic Eq., Plastics Materials/Resins, Plastics Production Machinery, Pollution Control Eq., Port/Shipbuilding Eq., Printing/Graphic Arts Eq., Process Controls - Industrial, Pulp/Paper Machinery, Pumps/Valves/Compressors, Regulations, Security/Safety Eq., Sporting Goods/Recreational Eq., Telecommunications Eq., Telecommunications Services, Tools - Hand/Power, Toys/Games, Trade Promotion Services, Transportation Serv. (other than Aviation), Travel/Tourism Services, Trucks/Trailers/Buses, Used/Reconditioned Eq., Water Resources Eq./Services

David A. Roman, Export Assistance Specialist
Phone: 212-860-6200
Fax: 212-860-6203
Email:David.Roman@trade.gov

Industries:Architectural/Constr./Engineering SVC, Automobile/Light Truck/Vans, Automotive Parts/Services Eq., Construction Eq., Education/Training Services, Information Services, Sporting Goods/Recreational Eq.

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Harlem U.S. Export Assistance Center.
